I think this introduced code checker [errors](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/11015):

~~~
gazebo/rendering/GpuLaser.cc:29:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, GpuLaser.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
gazebo/rendering/GpuLaser.cc:30:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, GpuLaser.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
gazebo/rendering/GpuLaser.cc:31:  Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, GpuLaser.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
Total errors found: 3
~~~
